actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 96-738.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 1452 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to extend the provisions of title XII of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, relating to war risk insurance.

summary.text: (Measure laid on table in House, S. 1452 passed in lieu) Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to extend the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to provide war risk insurance for American vessels through September 30, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to extend the provisions of title XII of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, relating to war risk insurance.
